articles.description: NASA’s Juno spacecraft captured the image of a massive black spot on the surface of Jupiter during its 40th close pass by the giant planet on February 25, 2022. As detailed by NASA in a recent communiquéthis mysterious stain is actually the big shadow project…

articles.title: Watch: This is what happens when you wring a wet towel in space - Times Now
articles.description: Water would normally flow down to the ground the moment you squeeze a towel. However, when astronaut Chris Hadfield did it on the International Space Station, the water clung to the washcloth instead, forming a tube over it and eventually over his hands that …
